User Interface Design and Implementation

This module will explore the key principles of User Interface design as you research existing Interfaces in games and then design your own. You will explore a range of User Experience principles and use these skills and knowledge to implement your own User Interface into a game engine.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate critical understanding and knowledge of User Interface design and established User Experience principles within games.

+  Evaluate the appropriateness of different designs and methods for solving User Interface design problems and propose solutions for implementing into User Interfaces.

+  Apply User Interface design principles and User Experience concepts within the game engine.

+  Reflect on the creation and iteration of User Interface designs. Critically evaluate implementations within the game engine and define improvements based on industry standards.
